passages.text:
You have entered the labyrinth. You grab a torch, and you can see several passageways up ahead. Which ever path you choose may decide your fate!

[[Go North -> Crumbled Hallway]]
[[Go East -> Small Hole]]
[[Go West -> Dark Tunnel]]
[[Gate]]
passages.name: Main Hallway

passages.text:
You chose to follow the crumbled hallway from the main room. You can smell fire; torches are burning up ahead! As you get closer, you see two more passageways to take.

[[Go North -> Chamber]]
[[Go East -> Long Hallway]]
[[Go South -> Main Hallway]]
passages.name: Crumbled Hallway

passages.text:
So you decided on going through the small hole in the wall. As you enter, you can hear sounds of running water. Maybe you can follow the water and find your way out of here!

[[Go North ->  River]] 
[[Go West -> Dark Tunnel]]
[[Go South -> Main Hallway]]
passages.name: Small Hole

passages.text:
It is very dark down this tunnel! You can only get through by following the walls with your hands to make sure you want to go the correct ways. However, it does appear to echo a bit more each time as you get further.

[[Go North -> Darkness]]
[[Go West -> Void]]
[[Go South -> Main Hallway]]
[[Go East -> Small Hole]]
passages.name: Dark Tunnel

passages.text:
You entered the chamber, but have reached a dead end. Turn back immediately! 

[[Go South -> Crumbled Hallway]]
passages.name: Chamber

passages.text:
You continued on down the very long hallway, only to realize that there is a wall at the end and no where else to go. Turn around!

[[Go South -> Crumbled Hallway]]
passages.name: Long Hallway

passages.text:
As you continue on to the river, you see a small dingy and some light near the end of the river. You can hop in and see where the river takes you, or turn back around now!

[[Go North -> Light]]
[[Go South -> Small Hole]]
passages.name: River

passages.text:
The darkness has consumed all visible elements around you. You have reached a dead end and need to go back the way you came.

[[Go South -> Dark Tunnel]]
passages.name: Darkness

passages.text:
Rather than choosing to go down a the dark path, you chose the void. You cannot see anything and you get to the end, where the wall ends and emptiness fills the room. In order to not get lost, you turn back around.

[[Go South -> Dark Tunnel]]
passages.name: Void

passages.text: You successfully followed the river to reach the light. It led you to the end of the labyrinth! You made it! You exit the dingy, and never look back!
passages.name: Light

passages.text:
You have been left untied, on the floor in front of this gigantic doorway. It appears to be a labyrinth! Find your way through the labyrinth by choosing the right directions.

[[Go North -> Main Hallway]]
passages.name: Gate
